chart.P: Kinematic Models/Differential Drive/Differential Drive Forward Kinematics/MATLAB Function
Kinematic Models/Differential Drive/Differential Drive Inverse Kinematics/MATLAB Function
Kinematic Models/Four-Wheel Steering/Four-Wheel Steering Forward Kinematics/MATLAB Function
Kinematic Models/Triple Omniwheel/Triple Omniwheel Inverse Kinematics /MATLAB Function
Kinematic Models/Four-Wheel Steering/Four-Wheel Steering Inverse Kinematics/Inverse Kinematics/Front Steering

eml.P:
function [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = fourWheelSteerInvKinFrontSteer ... (ref,wheelRadius,frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist) % ref = [vx;w]
% Initialize FourWheelSteering object persistent robot if isempty(robot) robot = FourWheelSteering(wheelRadius,[frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist]); end
% Run object's inverse kinematics method [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = ... inverseKinematicsFrontSteer(robot,ref(1),ref(2));
end

chart.P: Kinematic Models/Triple Omniwheel/Triple Omniwheel Forward Kinematics/MATLAB Function
Kinematic Models/Four-Wheel Steering/Four-Wheel Steering Inverse Kinematics/Inverse Kinematics/Zero Sideslip

eml.P:
function [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = fourWheelSteerInvKinZeroSideslip ... (ref,wheelRadius,frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist) % ref = [vx;w]
% Initialize FourWheelSteering object persistent robot if isempty(robot) robot = FourWheelSteering(wheelRadius,[frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist]); end
% Run object's inverse kinematics method [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = ... inverseKinematicsZeroSideslip(robot,ref(1),ref(2));
end

chart.P: Kinematic Models/Four-Wheel Steering/Four-Wheel Steering Inverse Kinematics/Inverse Kinematics/Parallel Steering

eml.P:
function [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = fourWheelSteerInvKinParallelSteer ... (ref,wheelRadius,frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist) % ref = [vx;vy]
% Initialize FourWheelSteering object persistent robot if isempty(robot) robot = FourWheelSteering(wheelRadius,[frontWheelDist,rearWheelDist]); end
% Run object's inverse kinematics method [wheelSpeeds,steerAngles] = ... inverseKinematicsParallelSteer(robot,ref(1),ref(2));
end
